statements: SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_id, capture_date FROM satellite_images WHERE capture_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT geographic_coordinates FROM satellite_images WHERE image_id = 3 ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT image_id, geographic_coordinates FROM satellite_images WHERE capture_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE capture_date = '2023-05-15'
SELECT image_id, geographic_coordinates FROM satellite_images WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-06-30'
SELECT DISTINCT capture_date FROM satellite_images ORDER BY capture_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT image_id, geographic_coordinates FROM satellite_images WHERE image_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY image_id DESC
SELECT geographic_coordinates, image_data FROM satellite_images WHERE geographic_coordinates LIKE '%Africa%'
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT image_name, capture_date, coordinates FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT analysis_id, land_cover_type, analysis_result FROM LandCoverAnalysis;
SELECT image_id, coordinates, capture_date, image_name FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_name, capture_date FROM SatelliteImages WHERE capture_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM LandCoverAnalysis WHERE land_cover_type = 'forest';
SELECT image_id, analysis_result FROM LandCoverAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_name, coordinates FROM SatelliteImages WHERE image_name LIKE '%forest%';
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT id, image_url, acquisition_date FROM satellite_images;
SELECT geographic_coordinates.id, geographic_coordinates.latitude, geographic_coordinates.longitude, geographic_coordinates.location_name FROM geographic_coordinates;
SELECT * FROM land_cover_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT satellite_images.id, satellite_images.image_url, land_cover_analysis.analysis_result FROM satellite_images JOIN land_cover_analysis ON satellite_images.id = land_cover_analysis.satellite_image_id;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_url, acquisition_date FROM satellite_images WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, image_url, acquisition_date, geographic_coordinates FROM satellite_images ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC;
SELECT analysis_result, analysis_date, satellite_image_id FROM land_cover_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geographic_coordinates WHERE location_name LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT image_id, image_location, capture_date FROM SatelliteImages WHERE satellite_provider='NASA';
SELECT * FROM ImageAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT image_id, analysis_result FROM ImageAnalysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT image_id, image_resolution FROM SatelliteImages WHERE image_resolution > 100;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages ORDER BY capture_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT image_id, satellite_provider, image_resolution FROM SatelliteImages WHERE satellite_provider = 'NASA' ORDER BY image_resolution DESC;
SELECT si.image_id, si.capture_date, ia.analysis_result FROM SatelliteImages si INNER JOIN ImageAnalysis ia ON si.image_id = ia.image_id WHERE ia.analysis_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT lc.change_id, c.location_description, lc.land_cover_type FROM LandCoverChange lc INNER JOIN Coordinates c ON lc.coordinate_id = c.coordinate_id WHERE lc.change_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY lc.change_date DESC;

SELECT si.image_id, si.capture_date, ia.analysis_result, c.latitude, c.longitude FROM SatelliteImages si INNER JOIN ImageAnalysis ia ON si.image_id = ia.image_id INNER JOIN Coordinates c ON ia.image_id = c.coordinate_id WHERE c.location_description LIKE 'City%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_id, acquisition_date FROM satellite_images WHERE acquisition_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM land_cover_classes ORDER BY class_id DESC;
SELECT class_name, class_id FROM land_cover_classes WHERE class_name ILIKE '%forest%';
SELECT image_id, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM image_analysis_results WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_id, coordinates FROM satellite_images WHERE acquisition_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_id, acquisition_date, analysis_result FROM image_analysis_results ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT class_id, class_name FROM land_cover_classes WHERE class_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT change_id, image_id, change_type FROM land_cover_changes WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
